DOC.brief_title: Transforaminal Lumbar Interbody Fusion PEEK Oblique Cages With Without Titanium Coating
DOC.detailed_description: Cages make polyetheretherketone ( PEEK ) titanium material reliably produce successful fusion rate good clinical outcome . However , paucity study assess optimal material cage system . The primary objective study compare Oswestry Disability Index ( ODI ) instrument transforaminal lumbar interbody fusion ( TLIF ) use either titanium-coated polyetheretherketone ( TiPEEK ) common PEEK cage . Secondary objective assess difference fusion rate difference pain quality life group .
